content:
Under the rubble of the administrative building of the object of critical infrastructure in Lviv region found the body of another dead man.

About thisreportedThe head of Lviv Ova Maxim Kozytsky.

“Unfortunately, under the rubble of the administrative building of the object of critical infrastructure in Lviv, which this morning attacked the winged rockets, found the body of another man. Sincere condolences to his family, ”he wrote.

Rescuers continue searching.

As reportedArmyinform, On March 31, 2024, the enemy attacked the winged rockets of Lviv region. As a result of the attack, a man was killed.
title: In the Lviv region, under the Zabola found the second killed after the Russian rocket stroke
description: This was reported by the head of Lviv Ova Maxim Kozytsky. “Unfortunately, under the rubble ...
author: Army Inform
